Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mtesser71
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect, atmosfer was perfect, room was brilliant. I felt I was at home. Thanks for your hospitaltiy.

Reviews.Title: “complete privacy”
Reviews.Author: Gulfairuz
Reviews.Content: me and my partner spent a night over there..very romantic and cosy..staff s friendly but very silent..all was going on as in a movie..everything in dark colors..we came at night and we liked that. there s a special athmosphere..great for those who came to spend night together. however, few moments to mention: walls r thin, bathroom could be decorated better.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel La Fransa
HotelInfo.Address: C/ La Franca Xica 40, 08004 Barcelona, Spain
